results.description: Former England midfielder Jack Rodwell is in Italy over a potential move to Serie A side Roma.
results.shortTitle: Rodwell in Italy over possible Roma move
results.title: Jack Rodwell in Italy over potential move to Roma

results.description: Chris Smalling concedes a controversial 93rd minute penalty as Roma are held to a 1-1 draw by Borussia Monchengladbach in the Europa League.
results.shortTitle: Smalling concedes late penalty in Roma draw
results.title: Roma 1-1 Borussia MÃ¶nchengladbach: Chris Smalling concedes controversial late penalty

results.description: Serie A side Roma have handed a lifetime ban to a supporter who racially abused defender Juan Jesus on social media.
results.shortTitle: Roma ban fan for life for racist abuse
results.title: Roma ban fan for life after racist abuse of defender Juan Jesus

results.description: On-loan Manchester United defender Chris Smalling makes his Roma debut but is unable to prevent them from slipping to a 2-0 defeat at home to Atalanta.
results.shortTitle: Smalling makes debut as Roma lose
results.title: Roma 0-2 Atalanta: Chris Smalling makes his debut as Roma's unbeaten run ends

results.description: Roma's missing children social media campaign helps find a second girl from London, taking the total to five.
results.shortTitle: Fifth child found via Roma campaign
results.title: Fifth missing child found via Roma social media campaign

results.description: Two missing Kenyan children featured in a social media campaign launched by Roma are found and returned to their families.
results.shortTitle: Kenyan children found after Roma campaign
results.title: Missing Kenyan children featured in Roma social media campaign found

results.description: On-loan Arsenal forward Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores on his debut as AS Roma beat Sassuolo 4-2 in Serie A.
results.title: Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores on Roma debut as Italian side beat Sassuolo

results.description: The European transfer deadline saw a number of Premier League fringe players depart - but were they discarded too soon?
results.shortTitle: Discarded early or just clearing the decks?
results.title: Premier League: Were these players discarded too soon?

thumbnail.altText: Fernando Llorente, Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Javier Hernandez

results.description: Serie A club Roma reach an agreement with Arsenal to sign midfielder Henrikh Mkhitaryan on a season-long loan deal.
results.shortTitle: Arsenal's Mkhitaryan joins Roma on loan
results.title: Henrikh Mkhitaryan joins Roma on loan from Arsenal

results.description: Luiz Alberto scores a second-half equaliser as Lazio secured a point in a pulsating Rome derby with Roma.
results.shortTitle: Lazio & Roma share points in derby
results.title: Serie A: Lazio and Roma share points in Rome derby

results.description: Manchester United defender Chris Smalling moves on loan to Serie A side Roma.
results.shortTitle: Man Utd's Smalling seals Roma loan move
results.title: Chris Smalling: Manchester United defender joins Roma on loan

results.description: A girl from London who featured in a missing child social media campaign launched by Serie A club Roma is found safe and well.
results.shortTitle: Missing child in Roma campaign found
results.title: London girl who featured in Roma missing child campaign found safe and well

results.description: Chelsea right-back Davide Zappacosta joins Roma on an initial six-month loan.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea's Zappacosta joins Roma on loan
results.title: Davide Zappacosta: Chelsea defender joins Roma on loan

results.description: Second-half substitute Gareth Bale scores in a penalty shootout as Real Madrid lose to Roma in a pre-season friendly.
results.shortTitle: Bale scores in shootout in Real defeat
results.title: Roma beat Real Madrid: Gareth Bale scores in shootout

results.description: Daniel Maldini has joined Luca Zidane and a number of other young footballers who are following in their father's footsteps.
results.shortTitle: The famous footballing names following their father's footsteps
results.title: Maldini, Zidane, Kluivert, Hagi, Weah - the sons of legends making their own way

results.description: Ex-Roma midfielder Daniele de Rossi, who left the Italian giants this summer after 19 years, joins Argentine side Boca Juniors.
results.shortTitle: Roma legend De Rossi joins Boca Juniors
results.title: Daniele de Rossi: Roma legend joins Boca Juniors

results.description: Roma partner with missing child charities the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children and Telefono Azzurro for a 'milk carton'-style social media campaign.
results.title: Roma launch missing child Twitter campaign

results.description: Former Italy striker Francesco Totti resigns from his role as a director at Roma, ending his 30-year association with the Serie A club.
results.title: Francesco Totti leaves Roma after 30 years as he resigns as director

results.description: As the rapper's favourite basketball team wins the NBA, it seems his notorious run of bad luck could finally have ended.
results.shortTitle: The Drake curse could finally be over
results.title: The Drake curse seems to have been killed

results.description: Roma appoint former Shakhtar Donetsk coach Paulo Fonseca as their head coach on a two-year deal in succession to Claudio Ranieri.
results.shortTitle: Fonseca leaves Shakhtar to coach Roma
results.title: Paulo Fonseca: Shakhtar Donetsk boss appointed Roma head coach
